price: 14 Dis-leur : « C’est Allah que j’adore en Lui vouant un culte exclusif et sincère.
arabic: قُلِ ٱللَّهَ أَعۡبُدُ مُخۡلِصٗا لَّهُۥ دِينِي

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: quli al-laha aʿbudu mukh'liṣan lahu dīnī
